kpi.name: M1006C238

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL BLIND HO DUE TO UE LOST WITHOUT MEAS
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups to another frequency with blind handover method due to UE lost when handover was done without monitored cell RSCP/EcNo measurement result. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond to RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP attempting to setup Radio Bearer on another frequency and the timer expires in the RNC and the attempt was done to a cell configured by the parameter ADJI-BlindHOTargetCell, without inter-frequency RSCP or EcNo measurement result received from the UE. The counter is also updated if the UE responds with RRC: CELL UPDATE.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL BLIND HO DUE TO UE LOST WITHOUT MEAS
